pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Material_Transaction_Archive = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
SELECT
    sysdate        extract_date,
    mp.organization_code,
    msi.inventory_item_id,
    msi.segment1,
    mmt.primary_quantity,
    mmt.transaction_date,
    mmt.transaction_id,
    mtt.transaction_type_name,
    flv.meaning    transaction_action,
    mmt.subinventory_code,
    mmt.transfer_subinventory,
    tst.transaction_source_type_name,
    mmt.transfer_transaction_id,
    mmt.transaction_reference,
    CASE
        WHEN tst.transaction_source_type_name = 'Job or Schedule'
             AND (
            SELECT
                COUNT(1)
            FROM
                apps.wip_discrete_jobs_v wdj
            WHERE
                wdj.wip_entity_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
        ) = 0 THEN
            'Work Orderless'
        ELSE
            tst.transaction_source_type_name
    END source_type,
    CASE
        WHEN tst.transaction_source_type_name = 'Job or Schedule' THEN
            CASE
                WHEN (
                    SELECT
                        wdj.class_code
                    FROM
                        apps.wip_discrete_jobs_v wdj
                    WHERE
                            wdj.wip_entity_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
                        AND tst.transaction_source_type_name = 'Job or Schedule'
                ) IS NULL THEN
                    (
                        SELECT
                            wdj.class_code
                        FROM
                            apps.wip_flow_schedules wdj
                        WHERE
                                wdj.wip_entity_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
                            AND tst.transaction_source_type_name = 'Job or Schedule'
                    )
                ELSE
                    (
                        SELECT
                            wdj.class_code
                        FROM
                            apps.wip_discrete_jobs_v wdj
                        WHERE
                                wdj.wip_entity_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
                            AND tst.transaction_source_type_name = 'Job or Schedule'
                    )
            END
    END wip_job_class,
    CASE
        WHEN mmt.transaction_source_type_id = 1     THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    pha.segment1
                FROM
                    apps.po_headers_all pha
                WHERE
                    pha.po_header_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
            )
        WHEN mmt.transaction_source_type_id = 2     THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    segment1
                FROM
                    apps.mtl_sales_orders
                WHERE
                    sales_order_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
            )
        WHEN mmt.transaction_source_type_id = 4     THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    request_number
                FROM
                    apps.mtl_txn_request_headers mtrh
                WHERE
                        request_number = to_char(mmt.transaction_source_id)
                    AND mtrh.organization_id = mmt.organization_id
            )
        WHEN mmt.transaction_source_type_id = 5     THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    wip_entity_name
                FROM
                    apps.wip_entities
                WHERE
                    wip_entity_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
            )
        WHEN mmt.transaction_source_type_id = 6     THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    segment1
                FROM
                    apps.mtl_generic_dispositions mgd
                WHERE
                    mgd.disposition_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
            )
        WHEN mmt.transaction_source_type_id = 7     THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    rcv.shipment_num
                FROM
                    apps.rcv_shipment_headers    rcv,
                    apps.rcv_transactions        rcvt
                WHERE
                        rcv.shipment_header_id = rcvt.shipment_header_id
                    AND rcvt.transaction_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
            )
        WHEN mmt.transaction_source_type_id = 8     THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    segment1
                FROM
                    apps.mtl_sales_orders
                WHERE
                    sales_order_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
            )
        WHEN mmt.transaction_source_type_id = 10    THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    physical_inventory_name
                FROM
                    apps.mtl_physical_inventories
                WHERE
                    physical_inventory_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
            )
        WHEN mmt.transaction_source_type_id = 13    THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    wip_entity_name
                FROM
                    apps.wip_entities
                WHERE
                    wip_entity_id = mmt.transaction_source_id
            )
        ELSE
            NULL
    END source_document,
    CASE
        WHEN flv.meaning = 'Ownership Transfer' THEN
            'Ownership Transfer'
        WHEN flv.meaning IN (
            'Subinventory transfer',
            'Staging transfer'
        )
             AND (
            SELECT
                mseci2.quantity_tracked
            FROM
                inv.mtl_secondary_inventories mseci2
            WHERE
                    mseci2.secondary_inventory_name = mmt.transfer_subinventory
                AND mseci2.organization_id = mmt.organization_id
        ) = 1 THEN
            'Transfer'
        WHEN flv.meaning IN (
            'Cycle count adjustment',
            'Assembly return',
            'Delivery Adjustments',
            'Negative component issues',
            'Negative component return'
        ) THEN
            'Adjustments'
        WHEN mtt.transaction_type_name IN (
            'WIP Return'
        ) THEN
            'Adjustments'
        WHEN flv.meaning IN (
            'Subinventory transfer',
            'Staging transfer'
        )
             AND mmt.transaction_quantity < 0
             AND (
            SELECT
                mseci2.quantity_tracked
            FROM
                inv.mtl_secondary_inventories mseci2
            WHERE
                    mseci2.secondary_inventory_name = mmt.transfer_subinventory
                AND mseci2.organization_id = mmt.organization_id
        ) = 2 THEN
            'Usage'
        WHEN flv.meaning IN (
            'Issue from stores',
            'Intransit shipment'
        )
             AND mtt.transaction_type_name IN (
            'WIP Issue',
            'Sales order issue',
            'Internal order issue',
            'Move order issue',
            'Field Service Usage'
        ) THEN
            'Usage'
        WHEN mtt.transaction_type_name IN (
            'Return to Vendor',
            'RMA Return',
            'Return to Vendor without Receipt',
            'LC Return'
        ) THEN
            'Return'
        WHEN mtt.transaction_type_name IN (
            'Account issue',
            'Account alias issue',
            'Miscellaneous issue'
        ) THEN
            'Miscellaneous out'
        WHEN mtt.transaction_type_name IN (
            'Account receipt',
            'Account alias receipt',
            'Miscellaneous receipt'
        ) THEN
            'Miscellaneous in'
        WHEN flv.meaning IN (
            'Receipt into stores',
            'Intransit receipt'
        )
             AND mmt.transaction_quantity > 0 THEN
            'Receipt'
        ELSE
            'Other'
    END transaction_classification,
    mmt.actual_cost,
    (
        SELECT
            user_name
        FROM
            apps.fnd_user fu
        WHERE
            fu.user_id = mmt.created_by
    ) created_by
FROM
    apps.mtl_material_transactions    mmt,
    apps.mtl_transaction_types        mtt,
    inv.mtl_parameters                mp,
    inv.mtl_system_items_b            msi,
    fnd_lookup_values                 flv,
    inv.mtl_secondary_inventories     mseci,
    inv.mtl_txn_source_types          tst
WHERE
        mmt.transaction_type_id = mtt.transaction_type_id
    AND mp.organization_id = mmt.organization_id
    AND msi.inventory_item_id = mmt.inventory_item_id
    AND flv.language = 'US'
    AND msi.organization_id = mp.organization_id
    AND flv.lookup_code = mtt.transaction_action_id
    AND flv.lookup_type = 'MTL_TRANSACTION_ACTION'
    AND mseci.secondary_inventory_name = mmt.subinventory_code
    AND tst.transaction_source_type_id = mtt.transaction_source_type_id
    AND mseci.organization_id = mmt.organization_id
    AND mmt.transaction_date < (
        SELECT
            gp.year_start_date
        FROM
            gl.gl_date_period_map    gdpm,
            gl.gl_periods            gp
        WHERE
                gdpm.period_set_name = 'COHR Calendar'
            AND gp.period_name = gdpm.period_name
            AND gdpm.period_set_name = gp.period_set_name
            AND gdpm.accounting_date = trunc(sysdate)
    )
    AND mp.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
    AND transaction_quantity <> 0
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"ORGANIZATION_CODE", "Organization Code"}, {"SEGMENT1", "Item Number"}, {"PRIMARY_QUANTITY", "Primary Transaction Quantity"}, {"TRANSACTION_DATE", "Transaction Date"}, {"TRANSACTION_TYPE_NAME", "Transaction Type Name"}, {"TRANSACTION_ACTION", "Transaction Action"}, {"SUBINVENTORY_CODE", "Transaction Subinventory"}, {"TRANSFER_SUBINVENTORY", "Transfer Subinventory"}, {"TRANSACTION_SOURCE_TYPE_NAME", "Transaction Source Type Name"}, {"TRANSACTION_REFERENCE", "Transaction Reference"}, {"SOURCE_TYPE", "Calculated Transaction Source Type"}, {"SOURCE_DOCUMENT", "Source Document Number"}, {"TRANSACTION_CLASSIFICATION", "Transaction Classification"}, {"ACTUAL_COST", "Actual Cost"}, {"WIP_JOB_CLASS", "WIP Accounting Class"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"CREATED_BY", "Created By"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared ORG = let
  ORG = "LDP" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ORG;
